title: The Gillette Venus & Olay Razor with SoftGrip Handle
description:
Gillette Venus & Olay have teamed up to bring you the most comfortable SoftGrip handle for confident control shaving. Pair it with Venus razor refills with 5-blade technology and Olay Moisture Bars to achieve a close shave with smooth and moisturized skin. 

This video is a close-up look at the Gillette Venus & Olay Razor with SoftGrip handle.
